Noun: the vital principle or animating force within living things
the general atmosphere of a place or situation and the effect that it has on people
a fundamental emotional and activating principle determining one's character
any incorporeal supernatural being that can become visible (or audibl)
the state of a person's emotions (especially with regard to pleasure or dejectio)
the intended meaning of a communication
animation and energy in action or expression
an inclination or tendency of a certain kind
